sentences.sContent: an electronic organizer (= a small piece of electronic equipment that you can use to record addresses, phone numbers etc )
...Conversion of paper to electronic medical records will help eliminate redundant tests and prevent drug interactions...
...They can also add the reservation directly to their electronic calendar...
...paper-driven medical system to electronic records that can be easily viewed and transmitted...
...scored high on three in particular: They spent five hours a day or more on electronic devices...
...The Consumer Electronics Show in recent years has begun to focus more on the practical value than the showiness of electronic devices...
...Fewer innovative products were found at this year's electronic products show...
...The market demand for electronic devices is now either declining or not growing as fast as before...
...The electronic industry is maturing even though no wonder products hit the market...
...Researchers reported that 39% of children and teens read daily using electronic devices...

phrases.pCn: 电子产品；电子设备制造业
电子设施，电子器件；电子仪表
电子镇流器；电子安定器
使用电脑控制之武器的战争，电子战争

remMethod.val: 以上四词均来自electric(adj. 电的)

trans.tranOther: electronic equipment, such as computers and televisions, uses electricity that has passed through computer chips, transistors etc
